reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Great lecturer, but the exams were tough. Really makes you think.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Her enthusiasm is contagious!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Clear explanations, but sometimes goes too fast. Needs better office hours.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Not very approachable and the labs were poorly organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging lectures with lots of stories, but too many readings.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Amazing professor! She made the readings so much fun.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Knows his stuff, but the assignments were really challenging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting discussions, but the grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear and concise. The best professor I've had!

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Deep thinker, but sometimes hard to follow. Exams were fair.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Engaging and well-prepared, but expect a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: She cares about her students and the material is very interesting.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Very technical and not very engaging. Hard to keep up.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her passion for art is infectious. Loved every lecture.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Good at explaining concepts, but the homework was overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Inspiring and knowledgeable, but the workload was heavy.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Great lectures, but could use more hands-on activities.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very informative and made the subject really interesting.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dry lectures and unclear expectations. Not recommended.

reviews.subject: Film Studies
reviews.review: Her passion for films shines through. Best class I've taken!
